title: Apoiadores
description: Commercial support for Rocky Linux is available from these sponsors and partners, as well as other non-affiliated companies.

ciq.name: CIQ
ciq.blurb: Acreditamos em ajudar as pessoas a fazer coisas incríveis. É por isso que o CIQ é um parceiro fundador do RESF. Oferecemos suporte comercial e serviços para o Linux Rocky para clientes em pesquisa, academia, governo, empresas, parceiros e todos no meio de trabalho.

openlogic.name: OpenLogic by Perforce
openlogic.blurb: OpenLogic delivers comprehensive support services for open source software, so that your teams can enjoy the benefits of using open source — and confidently meet your requirements including compliance with regulations such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI.
